name: World Coal Association
goal: The World Coal Association is the global network for the coal industry. Formed of major international coal producers and allied companies and associations, it works to demonstrate and gain acceptance for the fundamental role coal and low emission coal technologies play in achieving a sustainable, low carbon energy future.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Within the context of the EU the WCA advocates for the role of high efficiency low emission coal-fired power generation and carbon capture and storage technology in reducing emissions from coal-fired power generation. In this respect the WCA follows policy developments on energy, climate change and sustainable development. At present we do not follow any specific legislative files.
